name: css-filter-grayscale
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter grayscale

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-grayscale.css > css/css-filter-grayscale.css && tachyons src/css-filter-grayscale.css --minify > css/css-filter-grayscale.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-grayscale.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
